title: Hour 3 - The Truth About Kyrie Irving, Yankees Dominance
itunes:title: Hour 3 - The Truth About Kyrie Irving, Yankees Dominance
description:
Dan looks ahead to the second half of the MLB season and highlights the favorites to win the World Series. NBA Insider Dave McMenamin sets the record straight on Kyrie Irving's absence from the Drew League. Plus, Dan looks back on this day in sports history!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
